articles.title: 新幹線東京駅にホームドア 初の異編成対応

articles.title: Show HN: Bewaker – File protection for AI-assisted coding
articles.summary: I built Bewaker to prevent AI coding assistants from accidentally modifying sensitive files (configs, secrets, infrastructure code).It uses policy-based file locking with a cryptographic lockfile (.guardlock, Merkle + Ed25519). Protected files require an explicit unlock before changes land. Enforcement happens in VS Code and at commit via git hooks.Everything is local - no backend, no telemetry. Audit logs and keys stay on your machine.Website: https://www.bewaker.aiGitHub: https://github.com/be
